typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Key as string,
		title as string,
		value as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine') ~> Journeystructurezebra
source(output(
		{_id} as string,
		cohort_id as string,
		completion_time as timestamp,
		email as string,
		guid as long,
		journeys_id as string,
		journeys_name as string,
		status as string,
		type as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine') ~> BlobStoreZebra
Journeystructurezebra derive() ~> derivedColumn3
